T

Target - Interface in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack
Each Target must implement this interface.
TargetConsole - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
Displays messages in the console.
TargetConsole() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetConsole
The default constructor.
TargetConsoleFactory - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
Implements TargetFactory for the Console implementation of the Target interface.

TargetFactory - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack
TargetFactory.
TargetFactory() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.TargetFactory
This is the default constructor for the factory.
TargetFile - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
Record the log into a file.
TargetFile() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetFile
Creates a file with the default name: loggerFile.log
TargetFile(String) - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetFile
Creates a file with a specified name.
TargetFileFactory - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
A factory used to build a TargetFile.
TargetFileFactory() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetFileFactory
Default constructor.
TargetRolloverFile - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
Saves messages in a rollover file.
TargetRolloverFile() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetRolloverFile
Creates a rollover file with default values:
name: rollover_file.log
max size of the file: 10MB
TargetRolloverFile(String) - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetRolloverFile
Creates a rollover file with a default maxSize and a chosen name
TargetRolloverFile(int) - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetRolloverFile
Creates a rollover file with a chosen maxSize and a default name
TargetRolloverFile(String, int) - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetRolloverFile
Creates a rollover file with a chosen maxSize and a chosen name
TargetRolloverFileFactory - Class in fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl
A factory used to build a rollover log file.
TargetRolloverFileFactory() - Constructor for class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.impl.TargetRolloverFileFactory
Default constructor.
targets - Variable in class fr.esiea.CanadianLoggerjack.Configuration
The Targets HashMap
